document_data.name: Goldenstar
document_data.mainbody: '''Goldenstar''' was a stuffed-[[bread]] snack food popular in [[Berdusk]].
document_data.Description:
Goldenstars were triangular loaves of [[eggbread]], stuffed with ground [[sausage]], diced [[potato]]s (or other tubers), and drowned in [[chicken]] sauce. This handfood was often sold for only one [[copper]] piece.

A typical meal in taverns of Berdusk consisted of a cup of soup, stew, or broth, a tankard of [[ale]], and a plate filled with goldenstars, seared [[bacon]], sausage, or chicken, drowned in hearty gravy.
